meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Goldarned! I can't believe I forgot my lunch again.
meanings.sent2: Oh, goldarned! The rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent3: Goldarned mosquitoes always seem to find me, no matter what.
meanings.sent4: The traffic was a goldarned river of brake lights, never-ending.
meanings.sent5: Her goldarned laughter echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: Used as a euphemism for 'goddamned' or 'damned'.
meanings.sent1: That goldarned cat keeps sneaking into our garden.
meanings.sent2: I can't find my goldarned keys anywhere!
meanings.sent3: The goldarned rain made the roads slick and dangerous.
meanings.sent4: His goldarned stubbornness always gets in the way of progress.
meanings.sent5: The goldarned clock seemed to tick louder when she was nervous.
